recommended_degree: Teknik Informatika, Sistem Informasi, Teknik Komputer, Teknik Industri (Sarjana)
job_description:
Understanding of Agile, Scrum, and/or Waterfall methodologies
Proven ability to manage multiple projects and cross-functional teams
Excellent communication, organization, and leadership skills
Proficient in project management tools (Clickup, Jira, Trello, Notion, or similar)
Able to create and maintain documentation, schedules, and client communications
Background in software, IT, or product development is a strong plus
